oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Battle of Stone River
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Print of the Battle of Stones River depicting the Federal troops of General William Rosencrans fighting against Confederate troops under General Bragg. A Union column marches toward the action and a battery of cannon fires on Confederate troops as they charge.
Kurz and Allison was a well known Chicago firm specializing in colorful and dramatic chromolithograph prints of American historical events.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kurz & Allison
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: United States - History - Civil War, 1861-1865; Tennessee - History - Civil War, 1861-1865; Stones River, Battle of, Murfreesboro, Tenn., 1862-1863; Rutherford County (Tenn.)
Soldiers
